hadiths.text: Abdullah b. 'Umar reported that Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to come to Quba', i. e. (he came) on every Saturday, and he used to come riding or on foot. Ibn Dinar (another narrator) said that Ibn Umar used to do like this

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَسْجِدِ قُبَاءٍ وَفَضْلِ الصَّلاَةِ فِيهِ وَزِيَارَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of the Masjid of Quba', and the virtue of praying therein and visiting it
